Informed Choice about Cancer Screening

16 July, 2012

In July 2012 Minervation launched the Informed Choice about Cancer Screening for the King‚Äôs Health Partners. This website concerns the review to develop a new approach to present information on the benefits and harms of cancer screening for the public, patients and health professionals in a balanced and even-handed way, which is conducted on behalf of the NHS Cancer Screening Programmes.

The design was done by Design By Day and implemented in Wordpress by Minervation. It includes a user survey to let people voice their opinions about the review.

Launch date: July 2012
